/****************/
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	long long int n,hold,flag=0,div; 
	while(scanf("%lld",&n)!=EOF)
	{
	hold=n;
	while(hold!=0)
	{
		div=hold%10;
		if(div)
		{
			if(n%div!=0) 
			{
				flag=1; break;
			}
		}
		hold/=10;
	}
	if(flag) printf("Invalid\n");
	else printf("Valid\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
